name: Space Stowaway
description:
This is a short 2D platformer game, where the main challenge is to beat the level with the given amount of actions.

This Project was made for the Game Lab I Lecture at the University Wuerzburg.

Controls:

Walk: A/DJump:W/SpaceDash: Left ShiftLong jump: Jump while dashingReset: RSubmit/Leave Level: Enter

Notes: 

You can change the Gamemode in the Main Menu.

Credits:

Game Development:Maximilian Zang, Bengisu CetinkayaArt:Hannes Sonnemann (https://twitter.com/ArtGottfried)Sound Assets:Background Music:Music by AShamaluevMusic.  Website: https://www.ashamaluevmusic.com

name: Player losing or failing
